name: Guardian Portrait
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages: plus up to two other languages

traits.Antimagic Susceptibility: The portrait is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the portrait must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become unconscious for 1 minute.
traits.Constructed Nature: An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
traits.False Appearance: While the figure in the portrait remains motionless, the portrait is indistinguishable from a normal painting.
